attributes.action: For the Government to listen to the majhority of britons and stop sharia courts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This goes against the principles of Britains laws by allowing a religious authority to mete out judgements which are sexist and make a mockery of the secularism. This will also cause more division in the communities and encourage non muslims to further cut themselves off.
